metadata.title: CVE-2022-45150 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability was discovered in Moodle.This flaw exists due to insufficient sanitization of user-supplied data inpolicy tool. An attacker can trick the victim to open a specially craftedlink that executes an arbitrary HTML and script code in user's browser incontext of vulnerable website. This vulnerability may allow an attacker toperform cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks to gain access potentiallysensitive information and modification of web pages.

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
